line.text: Oh! I'm sorry, I didn't realize you're a duck. Please excuse me.
What can I do for you?
Well...the mayor asked me for a Security Report, do you have one?
Sure, but there's just one thing...
I'd need you to get me a piece of paper so that I can write the next report.
It's the standard procedure, you see.
Get me the piece of a paper and then I'll give you my Security Report.
